pullRequest.title: Add get attestation data endpoint
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Add the Standard API endpoint to get attestation data (/eth/v1/validator/attestation_data).
Deprecates the old /validator/attestation endpoint.
Fixed Issue(s)
#2756
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.

nodes.bodyText: should also put TAG_VALIDATOR_REQUIRED here, it appears in multiple groups

shorter summary, or it renders poorly. in the eth2 api, its 'Produce an attestation data'.
